name: binaryEncode
description: Converts binary data to a string.

params.name: binaryData
params.description: A string containing encoded binary data.

params.name: encoding
params.description:
A string specifying the encoding method to use to represent
 the data; one of the following:
 - hex: use characters 0-9 and A-F represent the hexadecimal value
 of each byte; for example, 3A.
 - UU: use the UNIX UUencode algorithm to convert the data.
 - base64: use the Base64 algorithm to convert the data.

examples.title: Encode a binary string back to a string using hex
examples.description: use binaryEncode to Encode with hex

examples.title: Encode a binary using UNIX UUencode (UU) back into string
examples.description: use binaryEncode to Encode with UNIX UUencode (UU)

examples.title: Encode a binary using base64 back into a string
examples.description: use binaryEncode to Encode with base64
